description: This data set shows the location of Baltimore City hospitals. The purpose of this data is to assist the City of Baltimore in identifying institutions that provides health care treatment by specialized staff and equipment. To assist the City's emergency organizations in identifying health institution during an emergency event. Cartographic, analysis, and planning.

name: Hospitals
